languages.text: "Уважаем{mf|ый|ая}, знайте меру! Оставьте и другим гражданам возможность покарать ксеносов в образовательных целях!"

traits.locale_text: "Уважаем{mf|ый|ая}, знайте меру! Оставьте и другим гражданам возможность покарать ксеносов в образовательных целях!"

languages.text: "My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"
languages.original_text: "Уважаем{mf|ый|ая}, знайте меру! Оставьте и другим гражданам возможность покарать ксеносов в образовательных целях!"

traits.locale_text: "My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"
"My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"
"My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"
"My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"
"My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"
"My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"

languages.text: 「全てが程よいバランスでございます！どうか教育目的のためにも、他の市民にこの異種族どもを罰する機会をお与えください！」
languages.original_text: "My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"

traits.locale_text: 「全てが程よいバランスでございます！どうか教育目的のためにも、他の市民にこの異種族どもを罰する機会をお与えください！」

languages.text: « La modération avant tout, {mf|mon bon monsieur|ma bonne dame} ! À des fins éducatives, je vous demanderai de laisser une chance aux autres citoyens de punir eux aussi ces xénos ! »
languages.original_text: "My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"

traits.locale_text: « La modération avant tout, {mf|mon bon monsieur|ma bonne dame} ! À des fins éducatives, je vous demanderai de laisser une chance aux autres citoyens de punir eux aussi ces xénos ! »

languages.text: “亲爱的大人，凡事要适可而止！请您给其他热心市民一个机会，也让他们有机会惩罚一下这些异形，达到教育的目的。”
languages.original_text: "My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的大人，凡事要适可而止！请您给其他热心市民一个机会，也让他们有机会惩罚一下这些异形，达到教育的目的。”

languages.text: "{mf|Werter Herr|Werte Dame}, alles mit Mäßigung! Gebt bitte auch anderen Bürgern eine Chance, diese Xenos zu erzieherischen Zwecken zu bestrafen!"
languages.original_text: "My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Werter Herr|Werte Dame}, alles mit Mäßigung! Gebt bitte auch anderen Bürgern eine Chance, diese Xenos zu erzieherischen Zwecken zu bestrafen!"

languages.text: «Mi querid{mf|o señor|a señora}, ¡con moderación! Por favor, ¡deje a otros ciudadanos castigar a estos xenos con fines educativos!».
languages.original_text: "My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi querid{mf|o señor|a señora}, ¡con moderación! Por favor, ¡deje a otros ciudadanos castigar a estos xenos con fines educativos!».

languages.text: "Değerli {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}, her şey kararınca! Lütfen diğer vatandaşlara da cezalandırma şansı tanıyın ki onlar da öğrenebilsin!"
languages.original_text: "My dear {mf|sir|ma'am}, everything in moderation! Please kindly leave other citizens a chance to punish these xenos for educational purposes!"

traits.locale_text: "Değerli {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}, her şey kararınca! Lütfen diğer vatandaşlara da eğitici amaçlarla zenoları cezalandırma şansı tanıyın!"
